\`\`\`{r} library(ggplot2)

# Read the data

all \<- read.csv(file.choose()) \# NetflixDataset.csv head(all)

# Plot High vs Low

qplot(data=all, x=High, y=Low) \# kind of Obvious!!!

# Convert to a matrix as clustering works better on a matrix

mat \<- cbind(all$High, all$Low) head(mat)

# Perform k-means clustering

kmeans_result \<- kmeans(mat, centers=3)

# Extract the cluster assignments

km \<- kmeans_result\$cluster

# Add cluster assignments to the data

all\$cl \<- factor(km) head(all)

# Summary of the data

summary(all)

# Plot High vs Low colored by clusters

qplot(data=all, x=High, y=Low, color=cl)

# Read the data again

all \<- read.csv(file.choose()) \# open NetflixDataset.csv head(all)

# Plot Low

qplot(data=all, y=Low) \# All over the place!!

# Perform k-means clustering on Low

kmeans_result_Low \<- kmeans(all\$Low, centers=3)

# Extract the cluster assignments for Low

km_Low \<- kmeans_result_Low\$cluster

# Add cluster assignments to the data

all\$cl \<- factor(km_Low)

# Plot Low colored by cluster

qplot(data=all, y=Low, color=cl)

# Plot Close

qplot(data=all, y=Close) \# All over the place!!

# Perform k-means clustering on Close

kmeans_result_Close \<- kmeans(all\$Close, centers=3)

# Extract the cluster assignments for Close

km_Close \<- kmeans_result_Close\$cluster

# Add cluster assignments to the data

all\$cl \<- factor(km_Close)

# Plot Close colored by quality

qplot(data=all, y=Close, color=quality)

# Plot Close colored by cluster

qplot(data=all, y=Close, color=cl)

# Read the data again

all \<- read.csv(file.choose()) \# open NetflixDataset.csv head(all)

# Plot High, Low, and Close

qplot(data=all, y=High) qplot(data=all, y=Low) qplot(data=all, y=Close)

# Convert to a matrix

mat \<- cbind(all$High, all$Low, all\$Close) head(mat)

# Perform k-means clustering

kmeans_result_all \<- kmeans(mat, centers=3)

# Extract the cluster assignments

km_all \<- kmeans_result_all\$cluster

# Add cluster assignments to the data

all\$cl \<- factor(km_all)

# Plot data colored by clusters

qplot(data=all, y=High, color=cl) qplot(data=all, y=Low, color=cl) qplot(data=all, y=Close, color=cl) qplot(data=all, x=Close, y=High, color=cl) qplot(data=all, x=Close, y=Low, color=cl) qplot(data=all, x=Low, y=Close, color=cl)

# Read different data

all \<- read.csv(file.choose()) \# open grades_km_input.csv head(all)

# Install and load plot3D library

install.packages("plot3D") library("plot3D")

# 3D scatter plot

scatter3D(all$High, all$Low, all\$Close)

# Convert to a matrix

mat \<- cbind(all$High, all$Low, all\$Close) head(mat)

# Perform k-means clustering

kmeans_result_3D \<- kmeans(mat, centers=3)

# Extract the cluster assignments

km_3D \<- kmeans_result_3D\$cluster

# Add cluster assignments to the data

all\$cl \<- km_3D

# 3D scatter plot colored by clusters

scatter3D(all$High, all$Low, all$Close, colvar=all$cl)
